500.title: 500 | template-next-app
500.heading: Unknown server error
500.description: We are sorry, the page you requested is temporarily unavailable. It could be that you have accessed an incorrect or outdated URL. Please check it again. Or try to find the desired page via our home page.

404.title: 404 | template-next-app
404.heading: Sorry, the page you are looking for was not found
404.description: We are sorry, the page you requested does not exist or is temporarily unavailable. It could be that you have accessed an incorrect or outdated URL. Please check it again. Or try to find the desired page via our home page.

home.title: Home | template-next-app
home.desc: This page is rendered on the server (React Server Component) and loads data from GitHub before the page is actually rendered in the browser.
